body_html: The logic can’t be modified here because the cudnn functions are stateless; the cache probably needs to be a class attribute (instance attribute wouldn’t be enough) of the CudnnRNN Function. Adam is right that the way to do that is not obvious.

body: The logic can’t be modified here because the cudnn functions are stateless; the cache probably needs to be a class attribute (instance attribute wouldn’t be enough) of the CudnnRNN Function. Adam is right that the way to do that is not obvious.
